Others: The match will take place on Monday, 14th October 2024.
The match will be shown live on S4C with live coverage starting at 7:20pm.
You can also live stream the match via BBC iPlayer.
Fans can watch the match live on the Viaplay International YouTube channel for free.
The match can also be listened to on BBC Radio Wales, BBC Radio Cymru, and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra.
